title: Add markdown rendering for output pane
description: Output is in markdown format. Add glamour (github.com/charmbracelet/glamour) for rendering markdown in the output pane. This will handle formatting, code blocks, headers, lists, etc. Use a dark theme matching Catppuccin Mocha palette.
closed_reason: Added glamour markdown rendering for output pane. Implemented catppuccinMochaStyle() with full Catppuccin Mocha palette for consistent TUI theming. Added newMarkdownRenderer() function, renderMarkdown() method, and integrated markdown rendering into buildOutputContent(), buildRunRecordContent(), and updateSelectedTaskView(). Updated tests to strip ANSI codes before content assertions since glamour adds styling.
